subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Peja Stojakovic joined the Indiana Pacers halfway through last season in a trade but signed a five-year, $64 million deal with the Hornets in July after his agent said he wanted to finish his career in Indiana.
snippet: Peja Stojakovic joined the Indiana Pacers halfway through last season in a trade but signed a five-year, $64 million deal with the Hornets in July after his agent said he wanted to finish his career in Indiana.
